markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, in the past … future … present sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts are not-self. And what’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’ …”

SN.36.1. Samādhisutta (“Immersion”)
